original_text: Then the priest shall look upon it: and, behold, if the hair in the bright spot be turned white, and it be in sight deeper than the skin; it is a leprosy broken out of the burning: wherefore the priest shall pronounce him unclean: it is the plague of leprosy.
korean_text: 제사장은 진찰할지니 그 색점의 털이 희고 그 자리가 피부보다 우묵하면 이는 화상에서 생긴 나병인즉 제사장이 그를 부정하다 할 것은 나병의 환부가 됨이니라

sentences.original_text: Then the priest shall look upon it:
and, behold, if the hair in the bright spot be turned white,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고, 보라, 만약 밝은 곳의 털이 희게 변하면,

sentences.original_text: and it be in sight deeper than the skin;
it is a leprosy broken out of the burning:
wherefore the priest shall pronounce him unclean:
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 제사장은 그를 부정하다고 선언할 것이라:

sentences.original_text: it is the plague of leprosy.
